reviews.text: A beautiful place (Placa Reial) and a lot of very good coin and stamp sellers there. It opens every sunday morning at 9 but don't go there too soon because many sellers open slowly so it's better to be there at 10 or later.
For miles in every direction in the Center of Barcelona on Sundays lays before you Flea Market of your dreams, get in there and look for whatever your heart desires.
